long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download Lazada product images and videos easily with this most popular tool!
Click once to save Lazada images in high quality directly to your computer. Simple and efficient!

# Getting Started
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension.
2. Open your target Lazada product page.
3. Click on the lazdownloader icon to open it.
4. Download product images by variants, main and description.
5. Export images to Excel.
# Features
1.Download Variant Images(*.zip)
2.Export Variant Details(*.xlsx)
3.Download Main Images(*.zip)
4.Export Main Details(*.xlsx)
5.Download Description Images(*.zip)
6.Export Description Details(*.xlsx)
7.One Click Download All Images(*.zip)
8.One Click Export All Details(*.xlsx)

# It's free?
Yes, Lazada Image Downloader is free.
